title: Treasure of the Grotoceans
creator_credit: Co Hoedeman, Gaston Sarault and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Two Grotoceans sent on a special mission find all kinds of surprises awaiting them as they roam the sea in search of treasure. Octopus-like puppets cut out of foam rubber are the central characters in this delightful underwater fantasy with its message about conservation and ecology.
